title: I know its been said a lot.. "League Isnt Fun Anymore"

replies.body:
The reality isn't that League isn't fun.
Your favorite champs aren't fun(Right now).

Everyone loves/hates the game at different points in time.
Then go play heroes of the storm, lol?

> [{quoted}](name=YaRossy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HrAwnOOQ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-08-29T22:55:48.463+0000)
>
> Then go play heroes of the storm, lol?

Thats kinda what I was implying? lol
